divergenceReason: The Reform path preserves the existing platform structure which has a fundamentally extractive business model. Real-world evidence from regulatory hearings shows that incremental reform of attention-economy platforms consistently fails because the profit motive overrides safety commitments. Dissolution and replacement with a cooperative model is the only path that addresses root causes.
problemText: A social media platform that exploits user attention through addictive design patterns, extracts personal data without meaningful consent, and neglects the mental health impact on vulnerable young users.
